abstract: Documents obtained by a House panel indicate that a unit of Johnson & Johnson tried to buy back defective Motrin without alerting regulators.
snippet: Documents obtained by a House panel indicate that a unit of Johnson & Johnson tried to buy back defective Motrin without alerting regulators.
lead_paragraph: The feud between Johnson & Johnson and Congressional investigators over the company’s recent recalls of over-the-counter medicines deepened on Friday as they disputed the meaning of company documents turned over to a House committee.

headline.main: More Disputes Over Handling of Drug Recall
headline.print_headline: More Disputes Over Handling Of Drug Recall

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
